original_text: If, however, the bull has had the habit of goring and the owner has been warned but has not kept it penned up and it kills a man or woman, the bull is to be stoned and its owner also is to be put to death.
korean_text: 소가 본래 받는 버릇이 있고 그 임자는 그로 말미암아 경고를 받았으되 단속하지 아니하여 남녀를 막론하고 받아 죽이면 그 소는 돌로 쳐죽일 것이고 임자도 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: If, however, the bull has had the habit of goring
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 그 황소가 받으려는 습관이 있었다면

sentences.original_text: and the owner has been warned
but has not kept it penned up
and it kills a man or woman
the bull is to be stoned
and its owner also is to be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그 주인 역시 사형에 처해져야 합니다
